name: Squirrel's Revenge
description:
Evil creatures came to your home, the forest! They are making a lot of noise and demolition! You need to stop them with whatever you have, which are nuts on the trees!

-CONTROLS-

WASD/Arrow: Move the squirrel

Left Mouse Button: Fire nuts

-INSTRUCTIONS-

Your objective is to protect as much trees as possible in given time. The wood cutters are coming from all directions. You need to collect nuts from the trees by simply running into them, and shoot at the wood cutters with your mouse. If you hit a wood cutter, it will stop for a while and continue its job afterwards. Don't get too close to the wood cutters because if you touch them, you will lose all of the nuts in your mouth.

The game is made in 72 hours at #LudumDare42

Click here for the Ludum Dare page.
